Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford and 130th due to, street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford and 130th due to, street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express and #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cornell/65th
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express and J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temp. rerouted via 67th, Stoney Island, and 57th  due to, street blockage near Cornell/65th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express and #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Stoney Island, and 57th  due to, street blockage near Cornell/65th. 

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
